description: Sedge (Carex cherokeensis) is an amazing yetoften underrated native grass species that produces spectacular yellow blooms in early spring. Its upright, sword-like foliage thrives in wet and boggy conditions, providing a stunning garden display that is ideal to brighten up any damp corner of a garden. On top of its attractive yellow foxtail-like blooms, this plant is also a great solution to erosion control problems as its dense grassy foliage spreads quickly, forming an abundant, mounded root system. Carex cherokeensis is one of natureâ€™s most valuable resources, versatile enough to be planted for both functional and decorative purposes.
